notes: All stats and crafting data pulled from dune.gaming.tools pages on Aug 25, 2025. No placeholders. Only verified parts included. Volumes shown as 'V' values from item headers when present.

small_vehicle_fuel_cell.name: Small Vehicle Fuel Cell
small_vehicle_fuel_cell.description: Vehicle Fuel Cell with low capacity. Refined from Fuel Cells at a Chemical Refinery. Used to power vehicles.

medium_vehicle_fuel_cell.name: Medium Sized Vehicle Fuel Cell
medium_vehicle_fuel_cell.description: Vehicle Fuel Cell with average capacity. Refined from Fuel Cells at a Chemical Refinery. Used to power vehicles.

large_vehicle_fuel_cell.name: Large Vehicle Fuel Cell
large_vehicle_fuel_cell.description: Vehicle Fuel Cell with high capacity. Refined from Fuel Cells at a Chemical Refinery. Used to power vehicles.

large.notes: Enough to refuel a Scout Ornithopter Mk6 twice

sandbike.name: Sandbike PSU Mk1
sandbike.description: Defines power efficiency and controls temperature for the Sandbike.

sandbike.name: Sandbike Tread Mk3
sandbike.notes: All attached treads must be of the same type.

buggy.name: Buggy Utility Rear Mk6
buggy.description: Comes with a turret seat. Attach to rear of Buggy chassis.

sandcrawler.name: Sandcrawler Vacuum Mk6
sandcrawler.description: Spice Header (scoop) for collecting Spice Sand. Requires a Spice Container to function.

welding_torch_mk1.name: Welding Torch Mk1
welding_torch_mk1.notes: Used to assemble/detach vehicle parts and repair with Welding Wire.

welding_torch_mk2.name: Welding Torch Mk2
welding_torch_mk2.notes: Faster repairs and higher quality than Mk1.

welding_torch_mk3.name: Welding Torch Mk3
welding_torch_mk3.notes: Top-tier torch for assembly, detach, and repairs.

uses: Store and restore Sandbike or Scout Ornithopter

vehicles_fabricator.name: Vehicles Fabricator
vehicles_fabricator.placement: Place near a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires base power to operate.

advanced_vehicle_fabricator.name: Advanced Vehicle Fabricator
advanced_vehicle_fabricator.placement: Place near a Sub-Fief Console with the Construction Tool. Requires base power to operate.

Vehicles Fabricator.notes: Place close to Sub-Fief Console and provide power

Advanced Vehicle Fabricator.notes: Used for Tier 6 vehicle parts; place near Sub-Fief Console and provide power
